result:
h1, p
  color: #FFF
  margin: 50px

#myMenu
  position: absolute
  left: 0
  top: 0
  width: 500px
  height: 100vh

.menuBack
  width: 50px
  position: relative
  top: 5%
  left: 5%
  transition: 0.3s

.menuBox
  left: 5%
  top: 5%
  width: 50px
  padding: 8px
  transition: 0.6s
  cursor: pointer
  &:hover
    box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)

.menuBar1, .menuBar2, .menuBar3
  width: 35px
  height: 5px
  background-color: white
  transition: 0.3s
  margin: 6px 0

.menuList
  margin-top: 60px

sourcesContent:
<template lang="pug">
  div(:style="{'background-color':color.bgc, height: '100%'}")
    router-view
  #myMenu(@click.stop='drawer = !drawer')
    .menuBack(:style="{'background-color':color.but}")
      .menuBox
        .menuBar1
        .menuBar2
        .menuBar3
    v-navigation-drawer(v-model='drawer' absolute='' bottom='' temporary='' :style='{backgroundColor: color.but}')
      v-list(nav='' dense='')
        v-list-item-group(v-model='group' active-class='white--text text--accent-4')
          v-list-item(v-for='item in menuItems' :key='item.title')
            v-list-item-title
              router-link(:to='item.link' :style="{color: '#FFF'}") {{item.title}}
    .home
      router-link(to='/' :style="{color: '#FFF'}") HOME

</template>

<script>
export default {
    data(){
        return{
            drawer: false,
            group: null,
            menuItems: [
                {title: "加班申請",link: '/OTsubmmit'},
                {title: "休假申請",link: '/leave/Picker'},
                {title: "打卡紀錄",link: '/recording'},
                {title: "補休累計時數",link: '/compensatoryTime'},
                {title: "職務代理人設定",link: '/agent'}
            ],
            color: {
            bgc: "#333333",
            but: "#A78E70"
            }
        }
    }
}
</script>

<style lang="sass">
h1, p
  color: #FFF
  margin: 50px

#myMenu
  position: absolute
  left: 0
  top: 0
  width: 500px
  height: 100vh

.menuBack
  width: 50px
  position: relative
  top: 5%
  left: 5%
  transition: 0.3s

.menuBox
  left: 5%
  top: 5%
  width: 50px
  padding: 8px
  transition: 0.6s
  cursor: pointer
  &:hover
    box-shadow: 2px 2px 2px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.6), 4px 4px 6px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4), 6px 6px 12px rgba(51, 51, 102, 0.4)

.menuBar1, .menuBar2, .menuBar3
  width: 35px
  height: 5px
  background-color: white
  transition: 0.3s
  margin: 6px 0

.menuList
  margin-top: 60px

</style>
